mainText:
He was a great man, innovator, and visionary and will be greatly missed. 
 His mark on the world in undeniable and will be remembered with the 
likes of Edison, Garcia, and Newton for his impact and vision.  I wish 
his spirit well, and his soul to flourish with all the well wishes of 
the millions who will remember him forever, and pass his legacy on into 
future generations.
header: Heartfelt condolences for the passing of Steve
author: Michael
